fields.title: Monmouth University New Jersey Poll, Number 39

datasetContact.datasetContactAffiliation: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey was conducted among residents of New Jersey and addresses approval ratings of the Gov. Christie, Pres. Obama, Sen. Lautenberg, Sen. Mendendez, Congress, local government issues, NJ Quality of Life Index, terrorism, views of the Democratic and Republican Parties, Jersey Shore vacations, and gas prices.

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
distributor.distributorAffiliation: Univ. of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
